rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area leading into the living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living space with integrated seating and entertainment zone.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Formal dining area for hosting guests; adjacent to the kitchen.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open kitchen with ample storage and counter space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor with private ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: Room for guests or family visitors on the ground floor.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Private living area and small bedroom for the domestic staff with basic amenities.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: An expansive, landscaped garden with native plants and pathways for outdoor leisure.

additional_features.name: Two-Car Garage
additional_features.description: Separate garage area attached to the main structure for two vehicles with storage space above or adjacent.
